guide.img: Just like we did in the last two lessons, we are again going to make our turtle goto 100 at the x co-ordinate by giving goto(100,0) and do the same to y by giving goto(0,100)
guide.code:
import turtle
        wn = turtle.Screen()
       wn.bgcolor('green')
        t1 = turtle.Turtle()
       t1.penup()
           
       t1.goto(100,0)

guide.img: Let's make it get back to the origin(0,0) again
guide.code:
import turtle
        wn = turtle.Screen()
       wn.bgcolor('green')
        t1 = turtle.Turtle()
       t1.penup()

       t1.goto(100,0)
       t1.goto(0,100)
        t1.goto(0,0)
